name: Efficient Diary File
summary: Learn about .EDFW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Efficient Diary is a Windows program that allows users to keep a password-protected diary. When a user first launches Efficient Diary, the program creates a file named MyDiary.edfw. This is a user's default diary. Users can also create custom diary files, which are saved as EDFW files.
EDFW files can contain text, images, tables, and attachments. Users can also store EDFW files on Efficient Diary's cloud server, if they do not want to store their diary on their computer.
NOTE: Efficient Software discontinued the Efficient Diary application.

description: An EDFW file is an electronic diary created by Efficient Software Efficient Diary. It contains text, graphics, and other information that a user has added to their diary. EDFW files can be opened in Efficient Diary but are protected by a password.

instructions: You can open an EDFW file in Efficient Diary (Windows). To do so, you must know the password used to create the file.
